md

Class HBanalysisMD

  • java.lang.Object
    • atom.HBanalysis
      • md.HBanalysisMD

  • public class HBanalysisMD
extends HBanalysis
    Utility class for hydrogen bond analysis in MD.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HBanalysisMD()
      Constructs with default settings: r(DA) = 3.5 Angs, a(D..H-A)=20.0 degree, without PBC.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HBanalysisMD

        public HBanalysisMD()
        Constructs with default settings: r(DA) = 3.5 Angs, a(D..H-A)=20.0 degree, without PBC.

    • Method Detail

      • setBox

        public void setBox(Box box)
        Sets a periodic box used in the simulation. Cubic box is assumed in this utility.
        Parameters:
        box - The cubic box

      • setAcceptorID

        public void setAcceptorID(int[] aID)
        Sets the type IDs for the acceptor groups. ID is assumed to be in a range of 0 - numOfType-1.
        Parameters:
        aID - the IDs of the acceptor groups

      • setDonorID

        public void setDonorID(int[] dType)
        Sets the type IDs for the donor groups. ID is assumed to be in a range of 0 - numOfType-1.
        Parameters:
        dType - the IDs of the acceptor groups

      • setNumOfID

        public void setNumOfID(int numOfType)
        Sets the number of Types
        Parameters:
        numOfType - the number of types

      • isHB

        public boolean isHB(Atom[] D,
                    Atom A)
        Description copied from class: HBanalysis
        Judge if atoms D and A are hydrogen bonded.
        Overrides:
        isHB in class HBanalysis
        Parameters:
        D - [0] Donor atom, [1] Hydrogen atom
        A - Acceptor atom
        Returns:
        True if hydrogen bonded

      • isHB

        public boolean isHB(Atom D,
                    Atom H,
                    Atom A)
        Description copied from class: HBanalysis
        Judge if atoms D-H and A are hydrogen bonded.
        Overrides:
        isHB in class HBanalysis
        Parameters:
        D - Donor atom
        H - Hydrogen atom
        A - Acceptor atom
        Returns:
        True if hydrogen bonded

      • getConnectivity

        public java.lang.Integer[][] getConnectivity()
        Returns the connectivity of donor-acceptor groups.
        Returns:
        Integer[NumOfResidue][Type ID of the hydrogen bonded residues]
